Text: It would be nice if there would be any subtitles available for this movie ? (English, Spanish or German) I like skandinavian movies very much, but I do not understand any of the skandinavian languages. THX

Wow, this is kinda suprising, there were only 10 original copies made of this movie for the public which were the prizes in a contest held by a swedish movie magazine. In other words getting an  original copy is next to impossible now.
